name: Pump kiln
description:
Description

Pump kiln is a prototype game made in Unity. The game is a cycle where more you have pumpkin more it's difficult.

  1.  Sow seeds.
  2.  Let them grow.
  3.  Harvest one by one before they rot. Watch out rot is spreading !
  4.  Buy more seeds ....
Credits
